statements.statement:
select * from uum_role where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( name like '%${key}%' or name_short like '%${key}%' or code like '%${key}%' or remark like '%${key}%' or app_code like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.name??> and name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.nameShort??> and name_short = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.nameShort)}' </#if>
<#if query.code??> and code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' </#if>
<#if query.sn??> and sn = ${query.sn} </#if>
<#if query.status??> and status = ${query.status} </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' </#if>
<#if query.appCode??> and app_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#-- 获取用户的角色 --> <#if query.userId??> and id in (select obj_id from uum_user_object where obj_type=7 and user_id=${query.userId}) </#if>
<#-- 获取(一层)部门的角色 --> <#if query.orgId??> and id in (select role_id from uum_object_role where obj_type=3 and obj_id in (${query.orgId}))</#if>
<#-- 获取(多层)部门的角色 --> <#if query.orgIds??> and id in (select role_id from uum_object_role where obj_type=3 and obj_id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.orgIds)}))</#if>
<#-- 获取组的角色 --> <#if query.groupIds??> and id in (select role_id from uum_object_role where obj_type=4 and obj_id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.groupIds)})) </#if>
<#-- 获取称谓的角色 --> <#if query.titleIds??> and id in (select role_id from uum_object_role where obj_type in(1,2) and obj_id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.titleIds)})) </#if>
</#if>
